org.springframework.cloud.skipper.shell.config

Class ShellConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.skipper.shell.config.ShellConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @Import(value=SkipperClientConfiguration.class)
public class ShellConfiguration
extends Object
    Configures the various commands that are part of the default Spring Shell experience.
    Author:
    Josh Long, Mark Pollack, Eric Bottard, Ilayaperumal Gopinathan, Janne Valkealahti, Gunnar Hillert
